name: AlpharettaNewsFlash
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to the latest news and weather from Alpharetta, GA. Add the Alpharetta Flash Briefing to your own Flash Briefing and ensure that Alpharetta news starts your day. Then just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
